questions: Can you elaborate on your experience as a Surveyor in building control at Kari, Gola and Sanghvi? What were your main responsibilities and achievements in this role?
How have you applied your skills in Angular, Machine Learning, SQL, Java, and Data Analysis in your previous work experiences?
What motivated you to pursue a career as a Surveyor in building control, and how do you see yourself growing professionally in this field?
Can you provide more details about your M.Sc in Facilis from Kade Group University? How has this education prepared you for your career as a Surveyor?
Could you explain the project "Adaptive global approach" that you worked on? What challenges did you face and how did you overcome them?
How do you stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in the field of building control and surveying?
Have you ever faced a difficult situation in your work as a Surveyor, and how did you handle it?
How do you approach data analysis in your work? Can you provide an example of a project where your data analysis skills were crucial?
What inspired you to obtain the Monetize customized platforms Certification, and how has it benefited your career so far?
In what ways do you see yourself contributing to future projects and teams as a Surveyor with your unique skill set and experiences?
